languages.text: Во служении Неумирающему культисты смерти превращают трупы ушедших в священные молитвенные алтари для своей кровавой паствы.
Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.
languages.original_text: Во служении Неумирающему культисты смерти превращают трупы ушедших в священные молитвенные алтари для своей кровавой паствы.

traits.locale_text: The cultists' service to the Undying One involves them turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.
The cultists' service to the Undying One involves them turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.
Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.

Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.
Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.

languages.text: Zum Dienst der Kultisten am Todlosen zählt es auch, die Leichen der Verstorbenen zu heiligen Altären zu verwandeln, an denen ihre vom Blut gesalbte Gemeinde beten kann.
languages.original_text: Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.

traits.locale_text: Zum Dienst der Kultisten am Todlosen zählt es auch, die Leichen der Verstorbenen zu heiligen Altären zu verwandeln, an denen ihre vom Blut gesalbte Gemeinde beten kann.

languages.text: Parte del servicio de los cultistas al Inmortal incluye convertir los cadáveres de los fallecidos en altares sagrados, ante los que rinde culto su congregación ungida con sangre.
languages.original_text: Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.

traits.locale_text: Parte del servicio de los cultistas al Inmortal incluye convertir los cadáveres de los fallecidos en altares sagrados, ante los que rinde culto su congregación ungida con sangre.

languages.text: 教団員による不死の者に対する奉仕には、故人の死体を神聖な祭壇に変え、血に塗れた信者たちが祈りを捧げるというものがある。
languages.original_text: Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.

traits.locale_text: 教団員による不死の者に対する奉仕には、故人の死体を神聖な祭壇に変え、血に塗れた信者たちが祈りを捧げるというものがある。

languages.text: 拜死教侍奉不死之神，职责包括将死者的尸体改造为神圣的祭坛，供受过鲜血祭礼的教众进行祈祷。
languages.original_text: Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.

traits.locale_text: 拜死教侍奉不死之神，职责包括将死者的尸体改造为神圣的祭坛，供受过鲜血祭礼的教众进行祈祷。

languages.text: Le culte rendu à l'Immortel par les membres de la secte implique notamment de transformer les corps des défunts en saints autels où leur congrégation consacrée dans le sang se prosterne en prières.
languages.original_text: Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.

traits.locale_text: Le culte rendu à l'Immortel par les membres de la secte implique notamment de transformer les corps des défunts en saints autels où leur congrégation consacrée dans le sang se prosterne en prières.

languages.text: Tarikatçıların Ölmeyen'e sundukları hizmetin bir kısmı; vefat edenlerin cesetlerini, kanla kutsanmış cemaatlerinin dua edebileceği kutsal sunaklara dönüştürmektir.
languages.original_text: Part of the cultists' service to the Undying One involves turning the corpses of the departed into sacred altars for their blood-anointed congregation to pray at.
